short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reposition YouTube captions directly below the player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move captions below the YouTube player for a clearer view of both video and captions. Easily switch between caption locations with "CP" for Custom Position and "DP" for Default Position, directly integrated into the YouTube player.
